testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Multiple Choice Question - Shuffling Choices"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I choose "Multiple Choice" link from the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I select the Shuffle Choices radio button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I check the fixed checkbox for the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I see the "Multiple Choice" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I double click the "Multiple Choice" Question Widget
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I see the Response Area editor opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I see the fixed checkbox checked for the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: And I assert that the Multiple Choice question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Multiple Choice question with Shuffling Choices and an option checked as fixed
